thread.title: Great location, lovely roons
thread.title_full: Great location, lovely roons - Review of London House Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Crabby72
title: Great location, lovely roons
text:
Stayed one night. Such a lovely friendly welcome by staff. Room was immaculate and smelt lovely. Bed very comfortable and had nice bed linen. Really useful having a little fridge in the room.
Location is just perfect, close to all the action in Bayswater but still quiet.
I will definitely be back.
